decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number (s):
ARGL1-CBLS-00-ZZ-DR-A-0001-S4-P03 (Site Location and Block Plan), ARGL1-CBLS-00-ZZ-DR-A-3001-S4-P03 (GA Plans), ARGL1-CBLS-00-ZZ-DR-A-3601-S4-P03 (GA Elevations)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow amendments to the rear elevation materials and roof lights in relation to planning permission reference 240445HH dated  28/03/2024 for 'Single storey side/rear extension (following demolition of existing); roof extension to rear (main) roof slope incorporating a Juliet balcony; and a part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope'
